helpText:
•	This application is created to help you learn foreign languages.
•	Your goal is to memorize words and their translations within a certain time limit and find them on the game field.
•	Select the cells corresponding to the current word from the word list under the playing field. If you do not remember the translation of the current word, click on it in the word list and hold it to mark it as forgotten.
•	You can change the size of the playing field using the sliders on the options screen.
confirmResetStatisticsQuestion: Do you want to reset the statistics?
loadingText: The dictionary data is being loaded...
confirmExitQuestion: Do you want to quit the app?
